subcategory.name: Dropdowns
subcategory.description: Dropdown and popover examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS dropdown and popover components to create dropdown menus for action items and navigation, featuring section dividers, icons, and headers. These dropdown components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
